title: mangaLamaai vaazga
sahitya:
mangaLamAi vAzhga ulagellAm vAn karuNai shUzhga 



anupallavi



ponguga engengum ponnum pashumaiyum bhOgamum tyAgamum yOgamum OngiyE 



caraNam 1



ghOra nirutarin guNDu pughaigaLum pOrum porAmaiyum poigaLum ponravE

vIramum adhyAtma dhIramum shAntamum bhArata shakti paravi poligavE 



caraNam 2



maDamai iruLum varumait-tuyarum aDimai narakak-koDumaiyum

tIrkkavE

kaDamaiyil veTrik-kadirgaL pozhigavE kalviyum palvaghai shelvamum

malgavE



caraNam 3



anbum aruLum aram poruLinbamum Atralum AyuLum pOTRip-perugavE

kaNgal iranDEnap-paNbuDan kUDiya kAdalar illark-karpakam OngavE



caraNam 4



jAti mada nira shaNDai vaLarttiDum bhEda buddhiyin pizhaigaL

ozhigavE

Adip-poruLin aruTperum jyOtiyil Aruyir yAvaiyum OrkulamAgavE
